name: cheяnoбyl simulator (chernobyl simulator)
description:
Chernobyl simulator, where you play as an employee left in an unknown nuclear facility somewhere in Ukraine, try to maintain the tempreture of the core and watch out for radioactivity, computers crash and electricity shuts as you try to call your bosses while refilling the core with liquad nitrogen

please rate us on: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/chenol-simulator
